name: Q2 Serves Infotech
description: Q 2 serves was launched in 2005 with a vision to achieve worldwide leadership in the sphere of IT and IT enabled services. They have expertise in providing services like Inbound call handling, Customer Support, Data Entry Services, Appointment setting, Lead generation, Telesales, Telephone surveys, Order taking, Telephone answering service, Web development and design services, seo, smo, ppc and sme services.
